6-1.label: Communication Intensive
6-1.description: Students must make one of their two required CI-M classes either 6.UAT or 6.UAR.
6-1.name: CIM2

6-1.label: Advanced Undergraduate
6-1.description: These classes meet the criteria that at least 40% of the grade for these 12-unit subjects is based on new advanced technical material that is rigorously evaluated through examinations, problem sets, projects, and papers.
6-1.name: AUS2

6-1.label: EECS
6-1.description: Any subject that satisfies departmental requirements is an EECS subject
6-1.name: EECS

6-1.label: Advanced Departmental Lab
6-1.description: At least 40% of the grade of the 12-unit subjects is based on labratory assignments
6-1.name: DLAB2

6-1.label: Independent Inquiry
6-1.description: At least 40% of the grade of the 12-unit subjects is based on a single, relativley open-ended project
6-1.name: II

6-1.label: Probability
6-1.description: These subjects provide grounding in probability
6-1.name: PROB
